title: Vegan berry and apple crumble
ingredients: ['Fruit filling', '300g frozen mixed berries, thawed', '4 small apples, peeled and chopped', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '3 tablespoons cornflour', 'Crumble topping', '125g plain flour', '80g oats', '100g caster sugar', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '240ml coconut oil']
